titles.title: To amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide that daylight savings time end on the first Sunday after the first Monday in November each year.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Finance and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 11/6/1997--Introduced. Amends the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide that daylight savings time end on the first Sunday after the first Monday in November each year.
